::KitKat::

She saw Wildfire run past her, terrified.
She laughed to herself.  She got the one who played with her mind and 
learned how to play back.  She  watched Wildfire run back tot he bast 
shouting.  She didn't think of anyone after her.  Maybe there was 
something in the forest.  She sniffed the air but only picked up 
Wildfire's scent.  She ran back to the base. But she was still 
chuckling in her mind.
